person.persName: Samuel Tolley (Ballard County, KY, blacksmith, waggoner, and soldier)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, wagon maker. Kentucky native. Married to Emily Tolley. Married to Elizabeth Tolley. Father of Joshene Tolley, George F. Tolley, Jasper Tolley, and Newton Tolley. Blacksmith in Ballard County in 1850. Wagon maker in Ballard County in 1860. Served in the 8th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as first lieutenant from September 13, 1862 to September 23, 1863.
